bibl.title: A New Musical Papyrus: Carcinus, Medea.
bibl.note: P. Paris Louvre Inv. E. 10534 [ed.: Annie BÉLIS, Un papyrus musical inédit au Louvre, CRAI 2004, pp. 1305-1329, 1 fac-sim., 8 portées musicales, 1 pl.]. - Analysis and Reconstruction of the Text. - The Plot of the Play. - The Date of the Musical Setting. - The Music.
WEST Martin L., A New Musical Papyrus: Carcinus, Medea.
